subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Athletes at the 2014 Winter Games barrel down an icy chute at 80 miles per hour and fly more than 15 vertical feet above the edge of the halfpipe, among other physical feats. In these interactive graphics and videos, learn their tricks and techniques — and then see how they used them to take home the gold.
